/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in many cities. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a dynamic and colorful snapshot of life in Beijing.
